function.name: washing_start
function.description: This function is used to start a washing cycle in a specified compartment of the washing machine.

location.description: The location where the SmartThings device is located.

room.description: The room where the SmartThings device is located.

device.description: The name of the SmartThings device that needs to have its washing cycle started.

compartment.description: The predefined compartment of the SmartThings device that needs to have its washing cycle started.
